PhysXLoader.dll means you need to install physx drivers from nvidia... lol

The game was installed with a nivida video card, the full game already installed is in a rar file, so unless you got a nividia video card, even if you download the missing DLL, it will crash after the loading screen.
Got the DLL file, installed latest DirectX, crashes after loading.

OK final post:
To fix the loading screen crash.
Go here: http://www.nvidia.com/object/physx-9.10.0513-driver.html
And download and install the 
PHYSX SYSTEM SOFTWARE
NOTE: IT DONT MATTER IF YOU DO OR DO NOT HAVE A NIVIDIA VIDEO CARD OR NOT!
I am running a ATI and it works.

You can watch the intro video,then it's loading.... and game suddenly crashes.No messages for missing dll,no nothing.
No problem with Nvidia Physx or with my vga card (ATI 4870 1 Gb) driver.Both,are updated.
I've tried to adjust the settings....antialiasing,e.t.c and no result.
I've also downloaded,the demo of the game,from the official site.I've heard something about Codec....With demo version,you can update Codec,DirectX e.t.c and as a matter of fact I did but,still I have the same problem.I can't even play,the demo version!
I use Windows 7 32 bit.
Sorry guys but,it seems that,aaron1046 is right....This game is,only for Nvidia users.
Mikeelo, I have exactly the same problem with an Nvidia card on win7 x64. I managed to launch the game only after erasing all the saves.  You just dont have to stop the game till yo finish it.. lol
With this patch I dont have any troubles .. so far..
If anyone is missing a .dll file, try looking for it on Google. Search for "missing (.ddl file name).dll"
